posts.title: Some Notes on Setting Up Ubuntu
posts.text: Some notes on problems I had to google multiple times when setting up Ubuntu, enoughâ€¦ Chrome KeyringIf you set auto login on boot, Chrome complains about not being able to access keyring and you have to enter the password on boot to use it. Go to Password and Keys Right click Login and click Change Password Enter the old password and leave the new password as empty It will shut up now Install Chinese Input Method Run: 1$ sudo apt install fcitx-bin fcitx-googlepinyin Go to Region & Languages Change IBus to fcitx Click Manage Installed Languages -> Install/Remove Languages -> Chinese Simplified Reboot and run: 1$ fcitx-configtool Click + and add Google Pinyin Configure Terminal ColorGo http://mayccoll.github.io/Gogh/ Ubuntu/Win10 Dual Boot Timer ProblemThank you MS!On Win 10, follow Option 2 on https://www.howtogeek.com/323390/how-to-fix-windows-and-linux-showing-different-times-when-dual-booting/
